-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | example https request to read from jokes api
--   
--   See README on GitLab at
--   <a>https://github.com/frankhjung/haskell-jokes#readme</a>
@package Jokes
@version 0.2.0

module Jokes

-- | Read joke from web site. The Either type is used for error handling,
--   so we can return error message if something went wrong.
getJokeResponse :: IO (Either String JokeResponse)
data JokeResponse
JokeResponse :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Int -> JokeResponse

-- | type of joke
[_type] :: JokeResponse -> Text

-- | setup the joke
[_setup] :: JokeResponse -> Text

-- | punchline
[_punchline] :: JokeResponse -> Text

-- | identifier
[_id] :: JokeResponse -> Int
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Jokes.JokeResponse
instance GHC.Show.Show Jokes.JokeResponse
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Jokes.JokeResponse
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Jokes.JokeResponse
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Jokes.JokeResponse
